Articles.Content:
Hello

I found myself in an inconveniant situation today. I had ship in low kerban orbit and I wanted to wait for the next launch window to Duna. At low altitudes like that, I couldn't go faster than x50. I took control of my Mun rover and I time warped until the launch window, then I went back to the ship in low kerbin orbit. Wouldn't it be easier if we could time warp faster in a situation like low kerbin orbit?

Also, even at x100 000, it takes some time to get a launch window to Eeloo. There again, x1 000 000 time warp would be very useful!

I haven't found such a topic in teh "already suggested list", so pardon me if it has already been discussed.

Alpheratz
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64804-0-23-WarpUnlocker-v1-(faster-time-warp-no-altitude-restrictions) I hope this does what you need?
